actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational and Applied Techology Education Act to permit the Secretary of Education to waive certain requirements with respect to the distribution of funds to secondary school programs to permit certain postsecondary institutions to receive such funds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Carl D. Perkins Vocational and Applied Technology Education Act to direct the Secretary of Education to permit a State to reserve and allocate specified funds for unique drop-out intervention programs offered by postsecondary adult vocational technical schools that serve high school students and provide accredited high school diplomas to them (notwithstanding certain allocation requirements for distribution of funds to secondary school programs).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational and Applied Techology Education Act to permit the Secretary of Education to waive certain requirements with respect to the distribution of funds to secondary school programs to permit certain postsecondary institutions to receive such funds, and for other purposes.
